channel.title: Recipes on Beards, Bytes and Brews

item.title: Above 8700ft Red
item.description: The prefered method of preparing the salsa is using a blender. Start by chopping up all the ingredients and placing them in the blender. Be cautious with how much salt you use. It is always safer to add a little then taste then add more. Blend the salsa in pulses and occationally use a spatula to mix up any ingredients that have not been blended. Pour and enjoy!
